result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kyle A Shaw Jr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kyle A Shaw Jr appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference.  No attorney has been appointed yet.  Case is adjourned to 11-7-22 at 1:30 pm for status of counsel by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
All previously ordered conditions of bail remain.

Defendant Kyle A Shaw Jr in court.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel Tyler Tabin in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference on 10-14-2022 at 1:30 PM, Branch 10.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Kyle A Shaw Jr not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status of counsel hearing date.  Defendant does not appear.  Court issued a bench warrant.  REMAND back to Commissioner.  Court ordered $500.00 PR bond forfeited.

Defendant Kyle A Shaw Jr in court.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant is not working and may qualify for State Public Defender Representation.  Court ordered defendant to go to the State Public Defenders office to be evaluated.  Case is adjourned to 10-10-22 at 8:30 am for status of counsel.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: EAB.
Pre-trial conference on September 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
This case was put on Br. 10 calendar on 9-1-22 in the afternoon, and they are down in the afternoon. New court date 9/1/2022 at 8:30 am.
Justice Point Violation Report forwarded to Judge for review and filed.

Court ordered no contact with MDM (DOB: 03/28/2000).
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Kyle A Shaw in court with attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Kyle A Shaw in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kyle A Shaw appeared by video means with Attorney. Case retabbed to DV intake judge of the week. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty. 
DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.  
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
